text:
Purchasing
agents with authority to bind the company on significant purchases generally
meet the duties requirements for the administrative exemption even if they must
consult with top management officials when making a purchase commitment for raw
materials in excess of the contemplated plant needs. See FOH 22i00. 29
CFR § 541.203(f) WHD
Opinion Letter FLSA 2008-01
